thing-type.label: 45607 2-Way Dimmer Switch
thing-type.description: 2-Way Dimmer Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtTransform any home into a smart home with the Jasco Z-Wave Wireless Lighting Control Dimmer Switch. The Jasco Z-Wave Wireless Lighting Control Dimmer Switch enables wireless control of on/off and dim functions of hard-wired incandescent lighting. The dimmer switch replaces your current light switch, uses your existing wiring, and provides Z-Wave wireless and in-wall control of overhead lighting. Use the dimmer feature to customize the lighting output and create the perfect ambiance for any room. Providing ultimate flexibility, the Jasco Z-Wave Wireless Lighting Control Dimmer Switch allows you to operate the switch by itself or easily integrate the switch with two-way, three-way or four-way wiring configurations by adding the Jasco Auxiliary switch for Z-Wave. Two-way wiring configuration turns the light or appliance on/off from one location. Three-way wiring configuration turns the light or appliance on/off from two separate locations. Four-way wiring configuration turns the light or appliance on/off from three separate locations. The Jasco Auxiliary Switch for Z-Wave is required for three-way or four-way installations. The dimmer switch includes an LED indicator light to easily locate the switch in a dark room. Take control of your home lighting with Jasco Z-Wave Wireless Lighting Controls! </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTap the top or bottom of the rocker.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTap the top or bottom of the rocker.</p&gt

parameter.description: Night Light<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefines the behavior of the blue LED.</p&gt <p&gtDefault is Night Light mode where LED is on when switch is off.</p&gt</p&gt

LED on when switch is ON

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Invert Switch
parameter.description: Invert Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtChange the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON. </p&gt <p&gtNote: If you invert the switches and also install the product upside down, remember the load will now be controlled by the right, not the left switch.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.description: On/Off Command Dim Rate<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. </p&gt <p&gtFor example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. </p&gt <p&gtIf you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.</p&gt</p&gt
